***ёжащийся.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:ежиться.html>ёжащийся</a> (15691)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Participle"><a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>Participle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ежиться.html>ёжащийся</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">jóžaščijsja</span>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:active.html>active</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ежиться.html>ёжиться</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">jóžitʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>

<ol><li><i>действ. прич. прош. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ерничать.html>ёрничать</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
</ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

</body>

***а.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> (11)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>See</a> <a href="Translingual">Translingual <a href = vnd.unilang:section.html>section</a></a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes"><a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>Usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>notes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h5>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:name.html>name</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></i>) <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> (<i>ā</i>), <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> stressed <a href = vnd.unilang:syllable.html>syllables</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:have.html>has</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sound.html>sound</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:long.html>long</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <i>f<b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b>ther</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>In</a> unstressed <a href = vnd.unilang:position.html>positions</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pronounce.html>pronounced</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:schwa.html>schwa</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:like.html>like</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:o.html>o</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <i>m<b><a href = vnd.unilang:o.html>o</a></b>ther</i>. (Unstressed <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></i>) <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pronounce.html>pronounced</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:same.html>same</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> unstressed <a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a></b> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:o.html>o</a></i>).)
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Balto-Slavic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Balto-Slavic language">Proto-Balto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-bsl-pro">*ō</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*h₁ōd</i> (presumed <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ablative.html>ablative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*éy, h₁e</i>). <a href = vnd.unilang:cognate.html>Cognate</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:lithuanian.html>Lithuanian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">õ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:possible.html>Possible</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:link.html>link</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:lithuanian.html>Lithuanian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">ar̃</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:question.html>question</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:particle.html>particle</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Russian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:russian.html>Russian</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a></span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>да</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:da.html>da</a></span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:with.html>with</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:lithuanian.html>Lithuanian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" <hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Conjunction_8"><a href = vnd.unilang:conjunction.html>Conjunction</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> (introduces <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:new.html>new</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:different.html>different</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:mean.html>meaning</a>).
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:сегодня.html>сего́дня</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:теплый.html>тепло́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:вчера.html>вчера́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:холодный.html>хо́лодно</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Sevódnja tepló, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b> včerá býlo xólodno.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>It</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:warm.html>warm</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:today.html>today</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:yesterday.html>yesterday</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>was</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cold.html>cold</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:яблоко.html>я́блоко</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:груша.html>гру́ша</a>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Éto <a href = vnd.unilang:ne.html>ne</a> jábloko, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b> grúša.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:this.html>This</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:not.html>not</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:apple.html>apple</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:but.html>but</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pear.html>pear</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a>?</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>A</a></b> što?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:why.html>Why</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:so.html>so</a>?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:else.html>else</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_3_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 3</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lithuanian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Lithuanian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:lithuanian.html>Lithuanian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">à</i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">õ</i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="lt">oà</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:expression.html>expression</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pain.html>pain</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:surprise.html>surprise</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:well.html>well</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gothic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Gothic language"><a href = vnd.unilang:gothic.html>Gothic</a></a></span> <i class="Goth mention" lang="got">𐍉</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="got-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ō</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:ah.html>ah</a>!</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">ā</i>, <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">āh</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:expression.html>expression</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:pain.html>pain</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:anger.html>anger</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ancient_Greek" class="extiw" title="w:Ancient Greek"><a href = vnd.unilang:ancient.html>Ancient</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:greek.html>Greek</a></a></span> <i class="polytonic mention" lang="grc">ἆ</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="grc-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">â</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:ah.html>ah</a>!</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Interjection_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:interjection.html>Interjection</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>)!
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:oh.html>oh</a>! <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:express.html>expressing</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:surprise.html>surprise</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:realization.html>realization</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Particle_3"><a href = vnd.unilang:particle.html>Particle</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>)
</p>
<ol><li>(<a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:particle.html>particle</a> used <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:seek.html>seek</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:confirmation.html>confirmation</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:eh.html>eh</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слышать.html>слы́шишь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>меня́</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b>?</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ty.html>Ty</a> slýšišʹ menjá, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b>?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:do.html>Do</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:hear.html>hear</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:me.html>me</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:eh.html>eh</a>?</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>Ты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прийти.html>придёшь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сегодня.html>сего́дня</a>, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b>?</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:ty.html>Ty</a> pridjóšʹ sevódnja, <b><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></b>?</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:so.html>So</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:you.html>you</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:come.html>coming</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:today.html>today</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:then.html>then</a>?</span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 4</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:abbreviation.html>Abbreviation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">ампе́р</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ampér</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:indeclinable.html>indeclinable</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>A</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:amp.html>amp</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ampere.html>ampere</a></li></ol>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_5_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 5</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Pronoun"><a href = vnd.unilang:pronoun.html>Pronoun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a></span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:invariable.html>invariable</a></i>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:criminal.html>criminal</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:he.html>he</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:she.html>she</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:it.html>it</a> (used <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:point.html>point</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:particular.html>particular</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:person.html>person</a>)</li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:средний.html>сре́дний</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, несклоняемое (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 0  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-а-</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:союз.html>Сою́з</a>; неизменяемое.

***абажур.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́р</a> (9869)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">abat-jour</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_4"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́р</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abažúr</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́ра</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́ры</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́ров</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li>lampshade</li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:date.html>dated</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> visor, <a href = vnd.unilang:wear.html>worn</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:forehead.html>forehead</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:protect.html>protect</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:eye.html>eyes</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sun.html>sun</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:humorous.html>humorous</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:order.html>order</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:norm.html>norm</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:pun.html>pun</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:ажур.html>ажу́р</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">ažúr</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>Всё</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:абажур.html>абажу́ре</a></b></i><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Vsjó <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> <b>abažúre</b></i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:everything.html>Everything</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:order.html>order</a></span></dd></dl></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:head.html>head</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:голова.html>голова́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">golová</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:башка.html>башка́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bašká</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ба.html>ба</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>жу́р</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абажур-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:аббревиатура.html>аббревиату́ра</a> (26427)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>бре<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ви<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ра</b>

Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-аббреви-</b>; суффиксы: <b>-ат-ур</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абвер.html>а́бвер</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">ábvɛr, ábver</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абвер.html>а́бвера</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>а́б<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вера.html>ве́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:вера.html>ве́р</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a |   <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> мн. ч. предположительны <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неупотребимы.

***аберрация.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:аберрация.html>аберра́ция</a> (23140)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language"><a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de"><a href = vnd.unilang:aberration.html>Aberration</a></i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href = vnd.unilang:aberration.html>aberration</a></i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:both.html>Both</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">aberrātiō</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>бер<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ра́<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ци<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>я</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 7a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-аберрациj-</b>; суффикс: <b>-я</b>.
</p>

***абзац.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́ц</a> (9380)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language"><a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de">Absatz</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́ц</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abzác</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́ца</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́цы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́цев</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:grammar.html>grammar</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:paragraph.html>paragraph</a>

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:начать.html>нача́ть</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:начинать.html>начина́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:новый.html>но́вого</a>) <b><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>абза́ца</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">načátʹ/načinátʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> (nóvovo) <b>abzáca</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:begin.html>begin</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:new.html>new</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:line.html>line</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:paragraph.html>paragraph</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:indent.html>indent</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:line.html>line</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:informal.html>informal</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:indentation.html>indentation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:at.html>at</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:start.html>start</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:paragraph.html>paragraph</a>.

<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:indentation.html>indentation</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">о́тступ</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">ótstup</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абза́цный о́тступ</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abzácnyj ótstup</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:красный.html>кра́сная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:строка.html>строка́</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">krásnaja stroká</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:euphemism.html>euphemism</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> пиздец</span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">пипе́ц</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">pipéc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:писец.html>писе́ц</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">piséc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">капе́ц</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">kapéc</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Usage_notes"><a href = vnd.unilang:usage.html>Usage</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:note.html>notes</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>Абза́ц</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:translate.html>translates</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:paragraph.html>paragraph</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:marked.html>marked</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:an.html>an</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:indentation.html>indentation</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> typographical <a href = vnd.unilang:character.html>character</a> ¶. <a href = vnd.unilang:conversely.html>Conversely</a>, <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:параграф.html>пара́граф</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">parágraf</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:translate.html>translates</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:section.html>section</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> demarked <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:section.html>section</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:break.html>break</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:by.html>by</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:symbol.html>symbol</a> §. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:also.html>also</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:раздел.html>разде́л</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">razdél</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>за́ц</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 5a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абзац-</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>за́ц</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:междометие.html>Междоме́тие</a>; неизменяемое.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абзац-</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="молодёжное"><a href = vnd.unilang:мол.html>мол</a>.</span> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="сленговое"><a href = vnd.unilang:чайка.html>сленг</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:выражать.html>выража́ет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сильный.html>си́льные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:эмоция.html>эмо́ции</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:абзац.html>Абза́ц</a></span>! <a href = vnd.unilang:вот.html>Вот</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:девушка.html>де́вушка</a>! <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="эвфемизм(ы)">эвф.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:крах.html>крах</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:конец.html>конец</a> чему-либо <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> кому-либо <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:другой.html>Други́ми</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слово.html>словами</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:атомный.html>а́томный</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; </ol>

<ol><li>кранты! трындец!</li>

***абитуриент.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абитуриент.html>абитурие́нт</a> (23944)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language"><a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de">Abiturient</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абитуриент.html>абитурие́нт</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abiturijént, abituriént</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абитуриент.html>абитурие́нта</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абитуриент.html>абитурие́нты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абитуриент.html>абитурие́нтов</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абитурие́нтка</b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абитурие́нтный</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абитурие́нтский</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:graduate.html>graduate</a>, school-leaver</li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>би<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри<span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>е́нт</b>

***абонемент.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нт</a> (32160)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">abonnement</i>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нт</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abonemént</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нта</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нтов</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абонеме́нтный</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:subscription.html>subscription</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:season.html>season</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ticket.html>ticket</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонент.html>абоне́нт</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abonént</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абоне́нтный</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abonéntnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абоне́нтский</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abonéntskij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абонировать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abonirovatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абонироваться</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">abonirovatʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>бо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:мент.html>ме́нт</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абон-</b>; суффикс: <b>-емент</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:проездной.html>проездно́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:билет.html>биле́т</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Какая-то <a href = vnd.unilang:девушка.html>де́вушка</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:протянуть.html>протяну́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>ему́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:абонемент.html>абонеме́нт</a></span>: «<a href = vnd.unilang:барышня.html>Ба́рышня</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:пробить.html>пробе́йте</a>!» <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Нина Горланова, «<a href = vnd.unilang:лава.html>Ла́в</a> стори», <span class="example-date">1987–1999</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***абориген.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абориген.html>абориге́н</a> (7142)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">aborigines</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href = vnd.unilang:ab.html>ab</a></i> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">origine</i> (<a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:begin.html>beginning</a>).
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абориген.html>абориге́н</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">aborigén</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="animate">anim</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абориген.html>абориге́на</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абориген.html>абориге́ны</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абориген.html>абориге́нов</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:feminine.html>feminine</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">абориге́нка</b>)

<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:корённый.html>коренно́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:житель.html>жи́тель</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">korennój žítelʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li>
<li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туземец.html>тузе́мец</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">tuzémec</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span>бо<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ген.html>ге́н</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:одушевленный.html>одушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абориген-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>

<ol><li>автохтон, <a href = vnd.unilang:корённый.html>коренной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:житель.html>жи́тель</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:туземец.html>тузе́мец</a></li>

***аборт.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:аборт.html>або́рт</a> (10603)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:аборт.html>або́рт</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abórt</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:аборт.html>або́рта</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:аборт.html>або́рты</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:аборт.html>або́ртов</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:abortion.html>abortion</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:computing.html>computing</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:abort.html>abort</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a><span class="hyph-dot" style="color:red;">·</span><a href = vnd.unilang:борт.html>бо́рт</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-аборт-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***абракадабра.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бра</a> (30163)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la"><a href = vnd.unilang:abracadabra.html>abracadabra</a></i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бра</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abrakadábra</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бры</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бры</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бр</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:nonsense.html>nonsense</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:gibberish.html>gibberish</a></li>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:бессмыслица.html>бессмы́слица</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">bessmýslica</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<hr />
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ра<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:да.html>да́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:бра.html>бра</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абракадабр-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>то</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:что.html>что</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бессмыслица.html>бессмы́слица</a> |  <a href = vnd.unilang:нечто.html>нечто</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бессвязный.html>бессвя́зное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:непонятный.html>непоня́тное</a>, непереводимое <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Девочка-мороженщица, <a href = vnd.unilang:видимо.html>ви́димо</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:привыкнуть.html>привы́кла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:общаться.html>обща́ться</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>людьми́</a> по-венгерски; <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>она</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:протянуть.html>протяну́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>мне</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мороженый.html>моро́женое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:автоматически.html>автомати́чески</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:выпалить.html>вы́палила</a> какую-то <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:абракадабра.html>абракада́бру</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

***абрек.html

***абрикос.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́с</a> (17250)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dutch_language" class="extiw" title="w:Dutch language"><a href = vnd.unilang:dutch.html>Dutch</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="nl">abrikoos</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">abricot</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spanish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Spanish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:spanish.html>Spanish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="es">albaricoque</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arabic" class="extiw" title="w:Arabic"><a href = vnd.unilang:arabic.html>Arabic</a></a></span> <i class="Arab mention" lang="ar">اَلْبَرْقُوق</i> |  <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ar-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">al-barqūq</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:plum.html>plum</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́с</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abrikós</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́са</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́сы</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́сов</a></b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><strong class="selflink"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́с</a></strong><sup>*</sup></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>adjective</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикосовый.html>абрико́совый</a></b>) <span class="ib-brac"><span class="qualifier-brac">(</span></span><span class="ib-content"><span class="qualifier-content">* <a href = vnd.unilang:informal.html>Informal</a>.</span></span><span class="ib-brac"><span class="qualifier-brac">)</span></span>
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:apricot.html>apricot</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:tree.html>tree</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:fruit.html>fruit</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:коса.html>ко́с</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:мужской.html>мужско́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 2-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 1a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абрикос-</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="ботаническое">ботан.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:плодовый.html>плодо́вое</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:растение.html>расте́ние</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дерево.html>дерево</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>рода</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:слива.html>сли́ва</a> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:лата.html>ла́т</a>. <span lang="la"><span style="font-family: Times New Roman, Arial Unicode MS, Lucida Sans Unicode, MS Mincho, Arial, sans-serif;">Prúnus</span></span></i>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:пройти.html>Прошли́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:несколько.html>не́сколько</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:деревня.html>дереве́нь</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:долина.html>доли́не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:речка.html>ре́чка</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:сад.html>сады́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вообще.html>вообще́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:растительность.html>расти́тельность</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чудесный.html>чуде́сные</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:дуб.html>дуб</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тут.html>тут</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:орех.html>оре́х</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:груша.html>гру́ша</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:яблоня.html>я́блоня</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; Чириков, Путевой <a href = vnd.unilang:журнал.html>журна́л</a>, <span class="example-date">1849–1852 гг.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абрикосовый.html>абрико́совый</a> (28923)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́с</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">abrikós</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-овый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ovyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикосовый.html>абрико́совый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">abrikósovyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)абрико́совее</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)абрико́совей</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:relational.html>relational</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:apricot.html>apricot</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:абрикосовый.html>абрико́совый</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:сок.html>сок</a></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>abrikósovyj</b> sok</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><b><a href = vnd.unilang:apricot.html>apricot</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:juice.html>juice</a></span></div></dd></dl></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:color.html>color</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:apricot.html>apricot</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ри<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ко.html>ко́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:выя.html>вы́й</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-абрикос-</b>; суффикс: <b>-ов</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:связанный.html>свя́занный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:соотносящийся.html>соотнося́щийся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>значе́нию</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>существи́тельным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:абрикос.html>абрико́с</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:между.html>Ме́жду</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>абрикосный</li>

</body> 
***абсолют.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:абсолют.html>абсолю́т</a> (22774)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latin" class="extiw" title="w:Latin"><a href = vnd.unilang:latin.html>Latin</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="la">absolutus</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абсолют.html>абсолю́т</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">absoljút</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="masculine gender">m</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:абсолют.html>абсолю́та</a></b>, <i>uncountable</i>)

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>аб<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:со.html>со</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:лютый.html>лю́т</a></b>

Зализняка) |  <a href = vnd.unilang:форма.html>фо́рмы</a> мн. ч. предположительны <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> неупотребимы.

font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:абсолют.html>Абсолю́т</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:только.html>то́лько</a> премирен <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> трансцендентен <a href = vnd.unilang:мир.html>миру</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>был</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бы.html>бы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:бог.html>Бо́гом</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ка</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:оставаться.html>остава́ясь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:для.html>для</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершенно.html>соверше́нно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нейтральный.html>нейтра́льным</a>, равнозначащим <a href = vnd.unilang:чистый.html>чи́стому</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ничто.html>ничто́</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%A1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B3%D0%B5%D0%B9_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Булгаков, Сергей Николаевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>С</a>.
